multiple_choice.question: Which of the following statements is correct?

options.A: The FA is responsible for overseeing club football and the England National Team.
options.B: Manchester United and Manchester City share a historic rivalry known as the Manchester Derby.
options.C: Liverpool and Manchester United have no historical rivalry.
options.D: The FA has complete ownership of the Premier League.

multiple_choice.question: Which of the following statements is correct?

options.A: The Premier League is directly owned by The Football Association (FA).
options.B: Manchester United and Manchester City are historic rivals in the Manchester Derby.
options.C: Liverpool and Manchester City share the same stadium.
options.D: The FA does not regulate international competitions.

options.B: They have no significant competitive history.

options.D: Liverpool was originally part of Manchester United.
